tool_description: An API showing all the latest Ukraine-Russia News.
name: Ukraine-Russia News
title: Ukraine-Russia News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Ukraine-Russia from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-russia-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-russia-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-russia-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-russia-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Ukraine-Russia News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Ukraine-Russia.
